scripts.confdev: yarn link @mdblog/code-plugin-dirtree && yarn link @mdblog/code-plugin-mathjax && yarn link @mdblog/code-plugin-mermaid && yarn link @mdblog/code-plugin-mindmap && yarn link @mdblog/code-plugin-orgchart && yarn link @mdblog/link-plugin-edit-on-github && yarn link @mdblog/mdblog && yarn link @mdblog/theme-default
scripts.confdev:off: yarn unlink @mdblog/code-plugin-dirtree && yarn unlink @mdblog/code-plugin-mathjax && yarn unlink @mdblog/code-plugin-mermaid && yarn unlink @mdblog/code-plugin-mindmap && yarn unlink @mdblog/code-plugin-orgchart && yarn unlink @mdblog/link-plugin-edit-on-github && yarn unlink @mdblog/mdblog && yarn unlink @mdblog/theme-default && yarn --force install
